111.content:
Riley sighed and flipped her hair. Her cat Luna meowed angrily from her shoulder. Her short, white dress was clinging to the black sweater under her robes. Her mom had said it would be cold. Wrong. "Where's the dumb platform....."

"Excuse me, errrr, do I know you" Said a boy with black hair and green eyes. He pushed his glasses up his nose. Cute, you think to yourself.

"I don't believe we've met, pleasure to meet you. I'm Riley." You nervously twisted a ringlet of your hair as it fell from your ponytail. He smiled at you.

"Don't you know me?"

"Harry Potter, I'm not gonna obsess about it, figure it bothers you."

"Wow...wanna sit with me?" Was he blushing...How cute! "Wanna sit with me?"

"....."
111.title: Platform

choices: stops and the lights go out, harry's scar hurts
1111.content:
"Sure" You say, smiling. You see him blush, again.

"Your eyes are very pretty, you know.."

You were the one blushing that time.

"excuse me, why are you talking to potter"

A tall blonde boy was behind you. "Go away, Malfoy" Harry said.

"No, not without your little friend. Don't hang around with Potter... he hangs aroung with mudbloods" You gasp and slap Malfoy.

"How dare you use that retchid term, its rude" You turn around and follow Harry on the train. You go into the compartment and there is a red-headed boy and a bushy-haired girl sitting there. The red-head was rolling on the floor laughing, and the brown haired girl was snickering loudly.

"Way to go, new girl, by the way, I'm Hermoine"

"I'm ron, and that was the funniest thing i've ever seen." Said the red-head. You took it that they didn't like him.

"Well, i've had to live with my aunt and uncle all my life. My father was a pretty important death eater. He killed my mother.... tried to give me to Voldemort because I have this special power. Bad. Anyways, my cousin has been called that plenty of times. His name is Alexander. I take offense to that term. I may be a pure-blood, but I hate types that think they're better because of it. Grrrrrr" You really think these people are your type. The train starts moving and you are all laughing like old freinds. The train suddenly...
1111.title: like old friends

choices: Harry is holding you on the train
11111.content:
The train lurches to a halt. You were thrown forward and Harry caught you gently. A strange tingly feeling swept over you. He helped you to your feet. You could barely see Ron holding on to Hermoine tightly and you couldn't help but sigh. It was obvious he was in love with her. Harry clutched his forehead. "Ahhhhh"

"Harry" You gasp and stand beside him. You use a pain numbing charm and his head hurts less. Erie green light is pouring through the train.

A bout of shrill cackiling high-pitched laughter echoed until it was drowned out by an enourmus rumble of thunder. You reached into your robes and pulled out your wand. Your muscles started to twitch as your body sensed the incredible danger. You wanted to change. The doors to the compartment burst open.

"Ahhh, dear, sweet Riley. We meet again," Harry took a step toward you and seemed to be defending you. "Oh, how sweet. Potter is trying to save you. You have to come with me. Your father sold you to me. You are nothing more than my slave, little one" His hand slithered to your face and slid down it. He brought his face close to yours and the memory of that night long ago came to mind. You felt his icy breath on your lips. You yanked your head away before he could do it again. "Feistey one, still, aren't you. Tried to disipline you didn't I. Ohhh, yes. Tempered one you are. Perhaps you need reminding" He said as his icy hand caressed your face. He backed you off of the train. You lept down and he followed you. Your body shook as you shrank and white fur curled over you. A blinding purple flash came from your eyes. You were done. Hermoine gasped. Ron suppressed a startled yelp. Harry stared openly. You lept at Voldemort. He kicked you. You howled in pain. You staggered back to him, and with your remaining strength, struck him with your sharp claws across the face. Blood poured out of the wound as a purple shimmer ebbed over you, returning you to a human form. " Until we meet again" He vanished. You collapsed into the mud. A huge bruise was forming on your stomach. A lump formed on your head. You looked at the blood on your fingertips. You felt yourself being lifted off the ground. You looked into Harry's concerned green eyes and passed out.
11111.title: Fight

choices: Ron and Hermoine...know whats really going on
Fred and George, still gonna harass you
111111.content:
You woke up. "Oh so your awake dear, you might be able to get to the feast if you hurry. You were put in Gryffindor."

"Oh..o.k." You get up and walk downstairs. You were not watching where you were going when a ghost popped up and startled you. You let out a slight scream and backed of the top stair. You fell backwards. You tripped past someone and grabbed them. You both rolled down the stairs. You landed with a thump at the bottom with someones arms wrapped around your head so it wouldn't hit the ground. Harry was on top of you.

"First time I've seen anyone fall down the stairs." He said smiling at you. You realized he was still on top of you.

"Errrr..Harry"

"Sorry" He was blushing furiously. He stood up and offered you his hand so you could stand up. He pulled you halfway up and you held yourself with your other arms. You slipped off teh last step and stubled against him. He didn't let you fall. Your eyes locked. You were drowning in his eyes. You were in a trance. His lips moved towards yours. A door flew open. You finally stood up and you pretended to be arguing about broomsticks. Who is it?

11311.title: A crush and a hate for Quidditch

1132.content:
An elbow jammed itself into my back. Instinctively I turned around. I stood inches away from the most gorgeous boy I’d ever seen. My jaw dropped open. He had sandy brown hair and a light dusting of freckles. He was almost my height which was strangely nice. I could look straight into his incredible eyes. He smiled at me in a way that made my insides quiver. My anger faded away.
“Sorry I bumped you.” His was voice was deep and musical. The sound of it thrummed in my bones.
“No, I-”
“Hello Oliver.” Cho purred over my shoulder. Oliver’s smile froze in an almost scared look.
“Hey Cho.” He nodded.
“You didn’t come find me after the game.” She pouted. By now every guy in a two mile radius was drooling. Oliver’s eyes flicked to the train.
“Well, you know, celebrating with my team. Hey I got to run, I’ll see you.” He practically ran away. Cho grinned triumphantly.
“He graduated last year and was drafted for the Puddlemere United Reserve Team. He’s coming back to get help in charms. He is going to be a teacher after he retires.” She told us as though they were close friends. Anne whistled her approval.
“Brawn and brains. You got a winner there Cho.” She patted her on the back. I rolled my eyes. I barely resisted the temptation to laugh. She was so obviously not his type.
“I’m going to say goodbye to my mom, okay? Go find a seat. I’ll be there in a minute.” I lied. I didn’t know whether they heard me or not. They had already started walking away. I felt a pang of anger but I let it slide. I ran up to my mom. “I changed my mind, I want that broomstick.”
“You’re going to learn?” My mom asked hopefully. She was always trying to coax me onto a broom.
“I can’t promise I’ll be good enough for the flying dance. But I’ll try.” I smiled weakly. Every girl in our family had been part of the flying dance. She always wanted me to learn, despite my debilitating fear of heights.
“Have mine.” Mom’s eyes filled with happy tears. She handed me her nimbus 2001. I hesitated before grabbing it. If ‘Oliver’ was on a quidditch team…Oh hell! I snatched the broom and ran.
“Love you mom!” I shouted over one shoulder.
1132.title: Oh, dear

11321.content:
I peeked into the compartment. Oliver was sitting reading a book. He looked up as I jumped in. I slammed the door shut behind me. I breathed a loud sigh of relief. I turned to face him. I faked a small gasp.
“Oh. Hello. Can I wait here for a while? I’m avoiding Cho.” If I was right he would laugh, if I was wrong…well I wouldn’t care then. He raised a brow.
“You guys aren’t close?”
“Not really, she’s more of a trophy girl.” I confessed. I snapped my mouth closed. I hadn’t actually meant to say that. Oliver laughed.
“And you’re not?” he teased.
“No.” I said indignantly through my grin. “For one, trophy girls are brain dead.”
“And you’re not?” He interrupted me with a smile.
“And ALL trophy girls are pretty.” I continued ignoring his words. His smile fell.
“And you’re not?” he asked seriously. I laughed, unfortunately loud and hard. For some reason I couldn’t stop giggling. I felt my face turn red. Oliver just watched me with wide eyes.
“Sorry…” I gasped breathlessly. I recovered myself. “It’s just…no one has ever said that before.” I explained. He frowned.
“Oh, I’m Oliver Wood.” He held out a hand as if to change the subject. I shook his hand warmly.
“I’m Lizzie Dominque.”
“Dominque? As in the Flying Dance Dominque?” He watched me with hopeful eyes.
“Uh, yes and at the same time no. I’m going to be in the flying dance…when I learn how to fly.” I admitted blushing furiously. His face fell.
“So you can’t fly?” he repeated. I shook my head.
“Um, I was wondering if you could you show me how? I mean you are on a the Puddlemere team, aren’t you?”
“Me?” He squeaked. He turned the idea over in his head. I saw a grin starting on his lips. “If you promise to introduce me to the rest of Flying Dance, I’ll teach you to fly.”
11321.title: Trophy girls

113211.content:
“My mom will be dying to meet you if you teach me to fly.” I told him honestly. He frowned.
“Why?”
“She’s been trying to get me on a broomstick my whole life.” I explained, making him more confused. “I’m deathly afraid of heights.”
“Well, I’m afraid of ghosts.” He shrugged.
“You don’t understand, last time I was on a broom I cried.”
“How old were you?” He frowned.
“It was two weeks ago.” I coughed embarrassedly. He blinked before clapping his hands together.
“Well I always liked a challenge. We could start with the stairs…” he trailed off lost in thought.
“Oliver?” Cho’s voice sounded outside the door. I tried to shush him but he answered her anyways. I closed my eyes and let myself shimmer into the background. Oliver twitched. Cho stepped in. “I thought I heard voices.” She accused.
“I was just talking to myself.” He said after a second. He must have believed it. “Actually I might have been dreaming. Yes, I think I was dream.” He repeated emphatically as though trying to convince himself. I smiled. Cho shut the door behind her.
“Was it a good dream?” she asked slyly. He nodded. He looked so unaware of her intentions. Innocent really. I snuck over to his side as she nearly sat on top of me. He was warm and smelled of some new kind of cologne. It was an amazing smell actually. I inhaled it. He twitched as though he felt me. I scooted so our sides were touching. He was really warm. He stood abruptly.
“Cho? I am going to go to the trolley.” He backed to the door. He bolted. I followed him out the door and shimmered back into reality.
“Oliver!” I shouted. He turned looking more scared than I’d ever seen anyone. I ran up to his side. “Are you okay? I swear gone for two seconds and you get scared out of your wits.” I chuckled. His eyes narrowed.
“When did you leave?”
“When you were mumbling about stairs, I wanted to go to the trolley. You didn’t seem to hear me when I tried telling you.” I lied.
“Wait, if you’re coming from the trolley, where’s your food?” He asked suspiciously. I rolled my eyes.
“I forgot my purse, silly.” I hated lying, yet here I was doing it again.
113211.title: Invisible ghost or memory loss?

114.content:
You flipped your hair over your shoulders. Where was the dang platform, you couldn't find it. Your cousin Derek was also trying to figure this out. "oi, Maria, any clue how we get on the bloody train" He was starting to get angry. You saw a tall boy with an owl cage and what looked like a broom handle.

"Muggle" You ask him.

"Nope, name's Wood. Oliver Wood." He was extremely cute. He was wearing a black sweater and khaki pants. He waved at two red-heads.

"Pardon me, but how do you get on the platform?"

"Oh, walk through that wall. I'll show you." He pulls you to the was and walks through. "There you go, see you at school"

"Bye" You say smiling.

"My cousin the flirt strkikes again..." Derek was standig behind you laughing.

"Whatever" You said and hit the back of his head. You got on the train.
114.title: Cutie

1142.content:
You weren’t in the mood to talk; especially to people you didn’t know. You and Derrick board the train, and find an empty compartment near the back. It seemed to be less hectic, and you like it when it was calm. It gave you the chance to draw or write poetry. You sit down, and get your drawing pad out of your Jan Sport; you were about to start your new piece when the compartment door swings open. You look up to see two guys, and a girl with bushy hair.

“Sorry, don’t really see many people near the back of the train,” A boy with gaping green eyes and messy black hair say taking a step back.

“It’s ok, um… I’m Maria, and this is my cousin Derrick.” Derrick gave a dirty look to the girl with bushy hair, ‘must be a mud-blood’ you think to yourself.

“Sorry, I’m Harry Potter, and this is Ron Weasley, and Hermione Granger,” he said pointing out each person.

“You should find your own compartment, we’re full here.” Snaps your cousin’s best friend Draco Malfoy

“Didn’t know you counted as company.” Hermione snaps

“Watch your mouth, you little mud-blood.” Derrick retorts back.

“Maria? So the rumors are true the Simmons clan transferred here,” Draco says smiling “I didn’t know Derrick was bringing you on this little adventure.” He says stepping into the compartment

“You learns something new everyday,” You say showing him your flirtatious smile.

“I guess so,” he says sitting beside you.

“Better leave, we wouldn’t want to catch the stench” Hermione snapped pulling the others out of the compartment, you catch Harry’s eyes and smile at me.

“So do you guys want anything? I’m dying of thirst” Derrick says standing up

“Could you get me something to drink?” You ask kindly

“Sure, want anything Draco?” He asks he asks heading out

“A drink sounds great” Draco said not breaking eye contact with you

“Alright, be back in a minute,” and with that you and Draco were left alone.

“So what’s up, haven’t seen you in like, what four years?” He says showing you his pearly whites.

“Nothing really, I’ve been doing a lot more art, and stuff like that.” You say leaning back in your seat

He chuckles “Why doesn’t that surprise me, you were always drawing even at dinner. I have to admit though you’ve grown up more beautifully then I’d expected,” his cheeks turn a shade of pink, but soon goes back to it’s pale white.

“That’s sweet of you to say” You say smiling back

Draco inches closer to you, and just as he’s about to kiss you the door swings open, and the two of you part quickly. Derrick hands the two of you the drinks, and sits down himself. He notices your flushed cheeks, and grins and Draco.

“So did you two find anything to talk about while I was gone,” He asks opening his butter beer

“I’d say so.” Draco said smiling at you

“So…. How’s life back at the Malfoy Manor?” You ask changing the subject quickly

“Couldn’t be better, father’s working on the new plan with Voldemort. And who knows, by the end of the year, out family’s could be sitting in luxury beyond our wildest dreams.” He says opening up his bottle.

An hour or so later, the two guys leave to go deal with ‘business’ leaving you alone to work on your art in peace. You got out your pad, and a freshly sharpened pencil. You let the lines flow on the paper, and you go off into your own world of peace and tranquility. You get out your colored pencils, and add color to your world. Draco and Derrick return, and catch you off guard.

“Looks like someone’s been day dreaming again.” Derrick said chuckling

“That’s POTTER!” Draco snapped swiping your drawing from your grasps.

“What?” You ask snapping out of your trance

“Why did you draw Potter?” He snapped throwing the paper back at me

I picked it up, and looked at it. Harry’s emerald green eyes were starring back up at me through the portrait. You were at a loss of words, you drew your cousin’s and his friend’s worse enemy, and worse of all, you didn’t even know you draw him. You just shut your pad, and get out as fast as you could. You open a nearby compartment, and run in without even checking if it was empty. You sit down, when you noticed you were in a room filled with guys, older guys. You notice one of the guys was the boy who helped you find the platform.

“Sorry, I didn’t know anyone was in here.” You blush standing up, but Oliver’s gentle hand pulls you back down.

“It’s ok, you can stay…. What was your name again?” He asked leaning back in his seat.

“Maria Simmons” you say smiling gratefully, you noticed the two red heads from before, besides being twins they looked kind of like Ron.

“This is Fred, and George Weasley, and Alex Fleming.” He said pointing to the guy next to the window; he had dark blue eyes and shaggy black hair.

“Are you related to Ron?” you ask raising a brow

“Yeap, don’t tell me he harassed you already.” The one you thought was George said snickering.

“Don’t worry he didn’t harass me, I don’t he got the chance with my cousin there and all.” You say weakly leaning back in your seat.

“So Maria, what year are you transferring in?” Fred asked looking at you

“I’m transferring into my fifth year.” You say in monotone, had to be the sixth time you answered that question.

“Yes!” was all you could hear, from the boy sitting by the window.

“Looks like you’re stuck with my brother, and his friends.” George joked happily

“Perfect, you can meet my brother, he’s in Slytherin though” Oliver said warning you

“It’s ok, I’m used to Slytherins already” You say grinning, a few minutes later a boy walked in your age, he had shaggy brown hair, and deep black eyes like his brother. You had to admit he was ten times cuter than his brother.

“Ahh… speak of the devil.” Oliver starts grinning “Tyler, this our fifth year transfer Maria Simmons, Maria this is Tyler my little brother.”

“I prefer younger, I’m almost as tall as you remember?” He said smacking his brother on the back, he looked at you and smiled making your heart flutter.
“Nice to meet you” He said smiling, while extending his hand. You take it, and he kisses it lightly.

“Wait…. Did you say Simmons? Your cousin’s looking for you, so is half the Slytherin house.” He said chuckling

“Well, here I am” You shrug, and he laughs.

Within the hour you arrive at Hogwarts, you head into the Great Hall to be sorted…….
1142.title: on the train

choices: he want's to talk to you about your little (gulp) task
115.content: Kyrie dodged through the shadows. Her black hair was sticking to her face as she panted heavily. She smoothed the black emerald satin of her dress. Her hair was pulled into a curly ponytail. Silver glitter sparkled in her hair. Blue and lavender crystals were sparkling along her hairline and in the corners of her eyes. Gold, lavender, and blue glitter was swilrled over her face, arms, and legs. She seemed to sparkle as she ran. Her hair was usually strait. She had been to a dance, and it hadn't gone so well. First that dratted freind of her father's Lucius Malfoy had shown up with his son, Draco. That hadn't been a pleasant experience. She was trying to run from him at the moment. She hated who she was, who people thought she was. She saw her reflection in a store window. She had to admit, even sweating like this, she could tell she was beautiful. She smiled and keeped running. She turned a corner and ran straight into....her father......
115.title: running from malfoy

1151.content:
"Hi,....errrr, daddy"

"Quiet, girl. You haven't done what I told you to do. You've got the looks, use them. Bring Potter to me,or else....even if you are my daughter" He said twisting your arm around and then letting go as he disapparated. You whimpered, panting and slid to the ground. It started to rain in Diagon Alley. This couldn't get much worse. She cried and started to fall asleep.

"Hello" She was hearing a boy's voice from somewhere around there. "Hello?" She couldn't seem to open her eyes. "Are you o.k.?" The voice was closer now. You felt a little sunshine on her face, then a soft touch. You touched whatever was touching your face. You opened your eyes to look into green eyes.

"Yeah" You touched a hand to your forehead and shook your head. A shower of water went everywhere. He laughed. You waved your wand and the crystals came off. The glitter was gone except for the three streaks on your eyelids. You realized how wet you were. A golden brown owl swooped in over your head and dropped a hogwarts letter into your hands. At almost the same time, a large white one gave a letter to the boy. You were still soaking. I'll be back in a minute. You changed into a royal purple crushed velvet tank top and a blue jean skirt. You adjusted a black beret over your long black, now straight hair. It had the Durmstrang crest on it. When you got back the boy was talking to a red-head and a bushy haired brunette. "I don't believe I caught your name" You said smiling. The red head turned and stared at you. The girl looked afraid. You decided to make up a last name so they wouldn't be terrified of you. No one knew what Voldemort's daughters first name was except for that it started with a K, but they knew her last name was Riddle. "Oh, by the way, my name is Kyrie...errr, Kyrie Ellason" The red-head shook his head and smiled. The brunette smiled and looked relieved. "And you people are?" you asked, lauging.

"Oh, this is Ron Weasley and Hermoine Granger"

"And you are?"

He looked at you in disbelief. "I'm Harry Potter" And at that moment you knew your father was going to be very angry with you.
1151.title: not good

11511.content:
You look into his bright green eyes for a second and then look down. the moment that you did he put his hand to his scar and grunted in pain.
"Are you ok?" asked Hermione.
"yah i think so." he said looking at her, a scared expretion on his face. Everyone elce looked at her to.

"What was that harry?" Asked Ron.
"When i looked into her eyes, it was the same felling that i had when Voldemort touched me." he said. there was silence, and Kerin walked away.
11511.title: Harry Potter

choices: Hermoine wants to talk to you
115111.content:
"Dang...why do I have to be his daughter. What is wrong with me...." She leapt onto the train. A tear slid down her face. She was so angry with herself. Her father apparated into her compartment.

"You would do well to take such excellent opportunites to use instead of throwing them out the window because of a silly little girls heart. I'll have to teach you a lesson young lady." You screamed as he used the crucio curse on you and he dissapeared after muttering the one that lasted for fifteen minutes.

She whimpered loudly and shuddered with pain. She started to cry, the pain wasn't stopping. A new wave of pain washed over her. It kept getting worse. When the pain reached its peak, whe couldn't help screaming. She was shaking on the floor. Harry, Hermoine and Ron burst through the door. They all looked scared and then alarmed. Harry ran over to you and picked you up and sat you back on the seat. "No....please...daddy, no...please...not again...I..can't..i'm..not like you..vvvvvv...vol..de..mort. I'm not like you..dad..leave..him..." You couldn't see anything.

"Hermoine, do you know how to relieve the crucio curse?"

"alleviate" she shouted.

You felt instantly better. Than they all surrounded you. "Talk" ron said. They were all holding you at wand point. You pulled your own wand with lightning quick reflexes.

"Get those things away from ME unless you want things to get ugly. I won't hurt you unless you threaten me. And I'll talk. O.K. here's how it goes. Name's Kyrie (Kee-ree-ay, for those of you are wondering. Its Latin). Kyrie, just Kyrie. Not anything whack about me. So get over it, now, I see something I need to take care of." You see malfoy, beating up a little first year, and you knew why. "Malfoy, stop"

"Oh you wanna take over"

"No. I'm not my fathers flunkie. Unlike your father and a lot of others. Looks like your shaping up to be a good one yourself."

He pushed you out of the way. "Crucio Maximus" He said the spell to the little girl. You lept in front of her and fell to the ground. You lifted your wand and undid it. Then you fell. Harry was there to catch you. He believed you. Hermoine helped the crying little girl and asked you if you were o.k. She believed you. Ron leapt up and raised his wand to Malfoy. They all believed you. Harry looked into your eyes and his scar hurt. You lifted your right hand and touched it. A pinkish purple light flowed from your fingers and his scar stopped hurting. He smiled at you and you realized he was still holding you. You saw your fathers eyes in the back of your head.

"Run, he's coming"

"Who" They all asked.

"You don't wanna meet him, trust me" You stayed there and your father showed up. You ran away as quickly as you could. You leapt onto your broom and flew expertly away from him. You got away before a major gust of wind hit you and you fell. Right into Harry's arms. He clutched his scar. You smiled at him and he smiled back, blushing. Oh no, why did this have to happen. The boy you were supposed to kill was causing you to get goose bumps and the chills. Great.

"Harry, what is wrong"

"I don't know what it is. My scar hurts like it does when Voldemort is around, but I can't see why"

"Because that little backstabber is his daughter, are you bloody blind?" Screamed Hermoine.


"Just talk about me like I'm not here. I won't mind" You said, your eyes flashing. "We'll see who you think is the real traitor. In a while... You glanced around. "Hmmph" You walked away. You turned around and saw your father's most pathetic follower yet. Wormtail. He raised his wand from behind them. He opened his mouth. They spun around, Hermoine glaring at you.

"Avada Kedavra" He started to say. You flipped in between Wormtail and the others. You shoved his wand hand backwards and pulled him down, and flipping him into the air with your feet.

"Leviosa" He stopped in mid air. You yanked your wand to the side and he flew into a tree. "There" You turned on your heel and pulled a pouch from your pocket and taking the Durmstrang patch from your beret and bewitching it into a Hogwarts one. You hesitated. "Listen" You said with your back turned. "I'm just trying to make my way around here. Think I'm evil or not. I don't care what you think. Opinions are of minimal importance to me. I'm just going to study, get good grades, and live my own life. Since we've managed to launch ourselves from the train, thanks in large part to me, saving your lives, TWICE" you said glaring at Hermoine. "We need to get to school. Come here. Trust me." You smiled and held out your hand. Suprisingly, Hermoine grimaced and place her hand in yours. Ron grabbed her hand Harry grabbed your other hand. You threw down a pinch of powder from the pouch. "Hogwarts" You reappeared in the great hall. You were sorted into Gryffindor. Hermoine started to like you. You glanced at Harry and smiled. He winked at you and smiled. You blushed. Ron and Hermoine smirked. You all walked to the common room, talking and laughing. People stared at you. You didn't care. For the first time in your life you had real friends. And maybe something more. You thought as Harry offered you his arm and you took it.

He vanished and left a chill of cold like a dementor.
'Can't that guy get a grip? i mean jeez its like he thinks he can just go around and kill people and torture people whenever he feels like it! GRRR.' i thought.

Not long after he left, Lucius and Draco came in the dungeon and both looked extremely angry. Lucius was the first to speak.
"Did you really think we didn't think this through? That we would just leave wands and brooms lying around and make escaping so easy? It's such a shame that Mudblood friend of yours broke the curses on them."

"DON'T YOU DARE CALL HERMIONE THAT!"
"It's also a shame that Potter and the blood-traitor got away." he said, as if i hadn't spoken.
"Change the attitude, or else i will be forced to use other methods of discipline."
"Why not just kill me!? I would much rather be dead than here with you!"
"Crusio!"
I dodged the spell by about an inch and got immensely angry.
"No matter," he said. "In a few days time it will all have been worth it. Come Draco, we must be going."

121.content:
Derek Ahara was small, skinny and had a thin bony face that was nearly as haunting as it was handsome. His black hair was very short and seemed almost painted onto his head. He shivered some as he was more comfortable in the tropical heat where he had grown up near the south of spain.
But now he was stuck here in this cold dark castle, so dimly lit that he tripped three times on his way up to his room. He settled in, made a few friends one of the best of which was an older student by the name of Drako Malfoy. He had just finished unpacking all of his things when there was a knock at the door.

124.content:
wake up, monsieur Delacour

Light passed the curtains as Alexander rubbed his eyes, waking up. Removing the silk blanket that covered his half-naked body, he looked at the female who woke him up, it was a female veela working with his family for galleons. He gave a small smile at the female before setting his feet off the bed and grabbing the bath robe she offered him. Going to the bathroom, he showered and did his morning ritual. Stepping back in the bedroom, he saw his room cleaned, bed arranged and his clothes for the day folded on top of the blankets. Wearing them on his almost dry body, he looked around his room, he was going to miss his home and his school. It was the year of the Triwizard tournament and he would be the only guy to join the female members of Beauxbaton's 7th year batch to their trip to Hogwarts. He got stuck to it since they needed the best representative on the males to help them, which meant him since he was the cousin of the possible champion, Fleur Delacour, he was 3/4th veela, he was the gentleman of their batch.

Going down the grand staircase and to the dining room, he saw his family- Monsieur Delacour, Aunt Apolline, Fleur and Gabrielle. Sitting between Fleur and Gabrielle, he grabbed a plate with pancake and ate silently, listening to Fleur and Apolline's conversation about the Tournament. Someone rang the doorbell and another female servant answered before going to the dining room "Monsieur Alexander, Mademoiselle Fleur, Mademoiselle Gabrielle, the carriage awaits" the three nodded, eating the last piece on their plate before going outside to see their Louis Vuitton luggages moved inside the carriages they're going to use to travel to Hogwarts. Saying farewell to their family, they entered the carriage where the other students smiled at them. Sitting on a couch near the window, he waved goodbye at his acting parents who smiled sadly at him. Fixing his beauxbaton clothes, he closed his eyes and waited for them to get to Hogwarts.
124.title: Alexander Delacour- A Veela Transfer
